sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Header from '../components/Header' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import { searchProducts } from '../store/actions/action' export default function Products() { const products = useSelector((state) => state.productSearch) console.log(products) useEffect(() => { dispatchEvent(searchProducts()) }, [products]) return (
{products !== [] ? ( <> {products.map((product) => (
Brand: {product.title}

Description: {product.description}

Price: {product.price + '$'}

Quantity: {product.quantity}

))} ) : null }
) }
